title: Weird Tales of Terror: Volume One
description: A collection of weird stories by award-winning horror author, Sèphera Girón plus the novel, The Witch's Field.  Wanna Go For a Ride? What's a lonely girl to do in a new town?  Mmm Chicken What happens when a dependent pet is replaced by a new lover?  Jean Jeannie: Are You A Boy or a Girl? When a woman hits menopause, her hormones can rage out of control. It's a special sort of magic when one can savour the best of both sexes.  What Would Lizzie Do? Haunted by the ghost of Lizzie Borden, a ghost hunter needs to have questions answered.  Release Kathy suffers from voices in her head. She yearns for "release" from her mental torment.  No One Listens Kathy (from "Release") escapes the insane asylum and tries to start a new life. However, now there's a new voice screaming commands at her and it's not in her head.  The Witch's Field (a novel) What does the future hold when you're a senior citizen wrestling with Alzheimer's? Can fortune tellers and psychics help solve a life time of mysteries? What is the evil hiding in the barn?
author: Sèphera Girón
